'''Full Force Forward in the Forbidden Fortress''' is an outdoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Wriothesley]], [[Chevreuse]] and [[Sigewinne]].

The blueprint is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
